text: Mahdi Mohammed Gulaid "Khadar" (, ) is a Somali politician and diplomat. He was the Prime Minister of Somalia, from 25 July 2020 to 23 September 2020. Farmaajo has a close relationship with his prime minister Mahdi Gulaid.Abdulle, Omar Yusuf. "Turkeyâ€™s opening up foreign policy in Somalia."
